title: Senior Technical Writer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Senior Technical Writer
We are looking for an experienced technical writer with the following qualities:
Must be able to: 

Own and maintain a suite of guides.
Work with multiple scrum teams in an Agile environment and adhere to sprint milestones.
Collaborate with subject matter experts, engineers, product managers, and other team members.
Produce clear, concise, and user-friendly technical documentation using topic-based writing principles.
Provide technical editorial support to the technical writing and content-contributing teams.
Work on several projects simultaneously and manage time accordingly.

Requirements:

Native English speaker.
Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.
5+ years of experience as a technical writer in an enterprise software development environment.
Experience working in an Agile environment.
Experience preparing topic-based documentation.
Ability to learn complex technology and tools.
Experience creating clear and structured guides for different audiences, including developers.
Experience with Madcap Flare, Git
Experience creating videos for technical documentation. Experience with Mimic or Camtasia is an
Experience with Atlassian tools (JIRA and Confluence) is an
Experience managing documentation systems or content delivery platforms is an
Knowledge of Information Architecture and content strategies processes to streamline documentation delivery is an


Key Soft-Skills:


Passionate about quality.
Great communication skills and excellent teamwork capabilities.
Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills.

#LI-HybridAbout NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
